article_title: 8 Things CFOs Must Know About Health Reform

og.description: Whether a Chief Financial Officer is running the fiscal operations of a hospital system, an insurance company or a company that simply employs individuals with health coverage, the decision-making process for sustainability is changing at a rapid pace.
